summary: This is a certification from Apple Inc. declaring that records were produced on January 8, 2019, in response to a subpoena served on December 31, 2018. The document authenticates the records as original or duplicates made in the regular course of business.

persons.name: B Na
persons.context: Employee of Apple Inc. who certifies the production of records in response to a subpoena.

events.title: Subpoena served on Apple Inc.
events.description: A subpoena was served on Apple Inc. requesting records.

events.title: Apple produces records
events.description: Apple Inc. produces records in response to the subpoena, as certified by a Legal Specialist.

keyFacts: Apple Inc. produced records in response to a subpoena served on December 31, 2018.
The records were certified on January 8, 2019, by a Legal Specialist acting as Custodian of Records.
The certification attests that the records are original or duplicates made in the regular course of business.
The document indicates legal proceedings involving Apple Inc. in the Epstein case context.
